title: Siblings and Secrets
description: As the title suggests each of the siblings have secrets. some are greater than others. But when Lucy and Bill go to Hollywood to attend their famous brothers, Halloween party a sinister secret begins to unfold, turning the party of the year into a deadly nightmare!The story begins as Lucy and Bill fly to Los Angeles and are greeted by Boris and his entourage. And as the party draws closer, a love affair starts to blossom, but when drugs and murder are revealed will the love still be there?This book is written with passion and is full of twists and turns, the fast pace compels you to keep reading and the gripping plot captivates you until the end!
author: E. Gibbs
